definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: And if war comes do such men as these shoulder the musket and go into the trenches?
sentences.chinese: 但一旦戰爭來臨，這類人會肩扛步槍進入戰壕嗎？

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個宣告火辣的夏天已經來臨的儀式。

sentences.english: The first wxdye were the Gaels -came about 600 BC.
sentences.chinese: 第一次高潮是約公元前600年蓋爾人的來臨。

sentences.english: With the arrival of winter, the snow and ice would help to cover the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 隨着冬天的來臨，冰雪會將管道遮蓋住。

sentences.english: Week -long national day is coming. I'm looking forword to seeing Yun who was my good classmate at college.
sentences.chinese: 十一長假即將來臨，萬分期待着大學同學贇的到來。

sentences.english: So here's to the impending revolution in biology. Come Darwin's 300th anniversary there will be even more to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我們預祝即將來臨的生物學革命。當達爾文誕生

sentences.english: When the earthquake comes, is what oneself place expression comes out augural what be?
sentences.chinese: 地震來臨之時，自身所表現出來的前兆是什麼？

sentences.english: Cole has reason to suppose his luck has turned.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾有理由相信他的好運將會來臨。

sentences.english: I think animals can sense disaster.They have a sixth sense.
sentences.chinese: 我想動物通常能感知大災難的來臨，它們有第六感。

sentences.english: Before most big storms there is that moment of calm.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數暴風來臨之前總有一段時間風平浪靜。

sentences.english: Since seldom coming in that long year set.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在一年中僅疏疏地來臨。

sentences.english: A new world will hang about.
sentences.chinese: 一個新的世界即將來臨。

sentences.english: Internet era, weaks the restraints of the above factors.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網時代的來臨，弱化了上述的束縛因素。

sentences.english: Yet Assiya is also a sign that change is coming.
sentences.chinese: 然而，阿西婭也是一個象徵，顯示着變化的來臨。

sentences.english: The clouds warned that a storm was coming.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲預示着將有暴風雨來臨。

sentences.english: As temperatures rise, or the advent of strong cold air will gradually weaken.
sentences.chinese: 隨着氣溫回升或者強冷空氣來臨會逐漸減弱。

definition: on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to keep up with/to catch up with/to overtake/to chance upon/in time for
